meanings.definition: In a manner that is the most loud.
meanings.sent1: She shouted loudliest to get her friend's attention.
meanings.sent2: The music played loudliest at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed loudliest when it wanted food.
meanings.sent4: The thunder roared loudliest during the storm.
meanings.sent5: The alarm blared loudliest in the morning.

meanings.definition: To the greatest degree of loudness.
meanings.sent1: He loudliest sang his favorite song in the shower.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks loudliest exploded in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The car engine loudliest revved before the race.
meanings.sent4: The crowd loudliest cheered for their team at the game.
meanings.sent5: The wind loudliest howled through the trees during the storm.
